definition: to expose (photography)/(fig.) to expose (a scandal)/(advertising) exposure/Taiwan pr. [pu4 guang1]

sentences.english: By exposing under different light filters, photographs with different image contrast can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 曝光时使用不同滤色镜即可获得影像反差不同的照片。

sentences.english: A relatively high exposure to the U.S. consumer.
sentences.chinese: 在美国消费者中相对高的曝光度。

sentences.english: The battle lines of the new world order were exposed at the World Trade Organization this week.
sentences.chinese: 本周，新世界秩序的各条战线在世界贸易组织曝光了。

sentences.english: The terms under which China Sonangol buys oil from Angola have never been made public.
sentences.chinese: 中国和安中石油签订的石油采购条款从未被曝光。

sentences.english: The child was underexposed to language.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子对语言曝光不足。

sentences.english: The blur is courtesy of a one-second exposure.
sentences.chinese: 模糊是曝光一秒钟的结果。

sentences.english: Separate exposure box design, contrapuntal accurate.
sentences.chinese: 分离式曝光盒设计，对位精准。

sentences.english: You 'd better consult the exposure meter if you are not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你算不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: You 'd better consult the exposure meter if you are not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你算不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: You'd better consult the exposure meter if you be not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你嘱不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: You'd better consult the exposure meter if you be not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你嘱不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: Manual mode allows independent adjustment of both controls.
sentences.chinese: 手动曝光模式需分别调整速度和光圈值。

sentences.english: Team Themis's machinations were exposed before they got past the proposal stage.
sentences.chinese: 忒弥斯团队的图谋还在立项阶段就被曝光了。

sentences.english: This metal plate is exposed to light and creates an image which is then transferred to paper.
sentences.chinese: 这种金属板在曝光后可以产生能被转移到纸上的图像。

sentences.english: You could use a tripod and a long exposure time.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用三角架，并加长曝光时间。

sentences.english: Range of kerf width and exposure may be changed for optimized performance.
sentences.chinese: 一系列的切缝宽度和曝光可能会改为优化的表现。

definition: to burst out/to appear unexpectedly/to break (media story)
(of video clips, rumors etc) to circulate on the Internet
foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
